original_text: Baasha decided to kill King Nadab. Baasha was Ahijah's son and he belonged to Issachar's tribe. This happened while Nadab and Israel's army were attacking Gibbethon, a town of the Philistines.
korean_text: 이에 잇사갈 족속 아히야의 아들 바아사가 그를 모반하여 블레셋 사람에게 속한 깁브돈에서 그를 죽였으니 이는 나답과 온 이스라엘이 깁브돈을 에워싸고 있었음이더라

sentences.original_text: Baasha decided to kill King Nadab
and he belonged to Issachar's tribe
This happened while Nadab and Israel's army were attacking Gibbethon
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 나답과 이스라엘 군대가 깁브돈을 공격하는 동안 일어났다

sentences.original_text: Gibbethon, a town of the Philistines
